Mendokusai

Tartarus

Guernsey Chess

23 Mar 2018

Somehow I got picked for the inter insular again this year and I've ended up playing in a bunch of matches online for Team Channel Islands. I never feel especially patriotic, or proud of Guernsey, but it is still nice to play as part of a team.
